author: jgallacher
msg: This class was only here for testing req_get_session and is not required for next release version.

author: jgallacher
msg: Added code to Session.Session() so it checks the Apache config for PythonOption session.
If PythonOption session does not exist, then the default session type will be determined base on the apache-mpm (ie. same behaviour as 3.1.4).
Currently only FileSession, DbmSession, and MemorySession can be specified via the PythonOption.

author: skitching
msg: * Remove all @author tags as per commons conventions
* Don't include commit message info from source code as per commons conventions
* Add feature to InputStreamLineBreakStage to ignore blank lines
This patch was provided by Kris Nuttycombe.

author: jm
msg: automc stuff; first off, disable svn committing and publishing of rule results to BZ until bugs with picking up BZ-comment changes are fixed; secondly, porting -- you really have to love Solaris sometimes, it tries very hard to be sane but fails miserably

author: jgallacher
msg: req_get_session is not ready for release 3.2 to it's implementation will be deferred to mod_python 3.3.0.
As a temporay measure calling req_get_session in version 3.2.x will raise a NotImplemented error.
The behaviour of PSP.run() in psp.py has reverted such that it no longer makes use of req.get_session().
